wybug_title: TVS-南方电视台官网注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2011-11-18：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2011-11-18：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 虽然做了转跳，但是依然是以asp页面存在。导致数据库泄漏，可能爆出管理员密码和用户。 详细说明：  原注入地址：http://www.tvscn.com/shownews.asp?id=387965727777778转跳后地址：http://tvsnews.act.hitvs.cn/news/newscontent-10358-1.htm爆出当前数据库为：tvs数据库类型：MySQL爆出表段：ACT_TIME,AD,ADMIN_PRIV_DETAIL,AD_SHOW,BBS_CATG,BBS_CATG_DETAIL,BBS_FORUM,BBS_TOPIC_TAG,BLOG,BLOG_REFER,BLOG_TRACKBACK,BUSINESS_COUPON,BUSINESS_INFO,CHAT_HISTORY,CHAT_MESSAGE,CHAT_ROOM,CHAT_SUBS,CHAT_TOPIC,CMN_BLOG_PUSH,CMN_COMMUNITY,CMN_GAME,CMN_GAME_SUBS,CMN_GROUP,CMN_USER,CM_ACT,CM_ACT_RELA,CM_ARREST_TOPIC,CM_ARTICLE,CM_ARTICLE_DETAIL,CM_CHANNEL,CM_DATA_SRC,CM_INFO_TOPIC,CM_INFO_TYPE,CM_LIVING,CM_NEWS,CM_NEWS_TAG,CM_NEWS_TAG_CNT,CM_NEWS_TOPIC,CM_OP_TMPL,CM_PAGE,CM_PAGE_DATA,CM_PETS,CM_PET_CMN,CM_SHOW,CM_SHOW_SUBS,CM_SHOW_TOPIC,CM_SUBJECT,CM_SUBJECT_DETAIL,CM_SUBS_SERV,CM_TAG,CM_TMPL,CM_TOPIC,CM_TOPIC_ARTICLE,CM_TOPIC_COMMENT,CM_TOPIC_HITPOINT,CM_TOPIC_MEDIA,CM_TOPIC_VOTE,CM_VOD,CM_VOD_TOPIC,CONVERT_LOG,CS_CONTACT_TAG,CS_SUBS,CS_SUBS_BIND,CS_SUBS_CITY,CS_SUBS_CONTACT,CS_SUBS_INVITE,CS_SUBS_MOOD,CS_SUBS_NOTIFY,CS_SUBS_ORG,CS_SUBS_SETTING,CS_SUBS_STATISTICS,CS_SUBS_TAG,CS_SUBS_TEMP,CS_SUBS_XSL2010,CS_TAG,LOG_COUNT,MEDIA,MEDIA_HITPOINT,MLIB,MLIB_RELA,MLIB_TAG,MSG_BOX,MSG_MESSAGE,MSG_QUEUE,NEWS_FEED,NM_LINK,PODC段ACT_TIME,AD,ADMIN_PRIV_DETAIL,AD_SHOW,BBS_CATG,BBS_CATG_DETAIL,BBS_FORUM,BBS_TOPIC_TAG,BLOG,BLOG_REFER,BLOG_TRACKBACK,BUSINESS_COUPON,BUSINESS_INFO,CHAT_HISTORY,CHAT_MESSAGE,CHAT_ROOM,CHAT_SUBS,CHAT_TOPIC,CMN_BLOG_PUSH,CMN_COMMUNITY,CMN_GAME,CMN_GAME_SUBS,CMN_GROUP,CMN_USER,CM_ACT,CM_ACT_RELA,CM_ARREST_TOPIC,CM_ARTICLE,CM_ARTICLE_DETAIL,CM_CHANNEL,CM_DATA_SRC,CM_INFO_TOPIC,CM_INFO_TYPE,CM_LIVING,CM_NEWS,CM_NEWS_TAG,CM_NEWS_TAG_CNT,CM_NEWS_TOPIC,CM_OP_TMPL,CM_PAGE,CM_PAGE_DATA,CM_PETS,CM_PET_CMN,CM_SHOW,CM_SHOW_SUBS,CM_SHOW_TOPIC,CM_SUBJECT,CM_SUBJECT_DETAIL,CM_SUBS_SERV,CM_TAG,CM_TMPL,CM_TOPIC,CM_TOPIC_ARTICLE,CM_TOPIC_COMMENT,CM_TOPIC_HITPOINT,CM_TOPIC_MEDIA,CM_TOPIC_VOTE,CM_VOD,CM_VOD_TOPIC,CONVERT_LOG,CS_CONTACT_TAG,CS_SUBS,CS_SUBS_BIND,CS_SUBS_CITY,CS_SUBS_CONTACT,CS_SUBS_INVITE,CS_SUBS_MOOD,CS_SUBS_NOTIFY,CS_SU
